text:
# Import dependencies and create a client...
completion = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="qwen-mt-turbo",    # Select the model
    # The messages array must contain a single message with its role set to user. Its content is the text to be translated.
    messages=[{"role": "user", "content": "I did not laugh after watching this video"}],    
    # Because translation_options is not a standard OpenAI parameter, pass it through extra_body.
    extra_body={"translation_options": {"source_lang": "English", "target_lang": "Spanish"}},
)
